title: Methods of extrapolating RCT evidence for economic evaluation
abstractText: Treatment costs and benefits have to estimated when they are unknown beyond a certain time period, and the appropriate time the costs or benefits last is judged by NICE to be longer. This may add uncertainty to NICE s decison making process about whether or not the treatment should be funded, as there are usually various ways of obtaining these estimates. The research project will review and compare the different approaches and recommend the best ways of undertaking the estimation for different situations.
